TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit AlternateView extends System.Net.Mail.AttachmentBase

summary.span: 表示电子邮件的查看格式。

span.span: Represents the format to view an email message.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用类以不同的格式指定电子邮件的副本。Use the class to specify copies of an email message in different formats. 例如，如果您以 html 格式发送一条消息，可能还想提供纯文本版本，以防某些收件人使用的电子邮件阅读程序不能显示 HTML 内容。For example, if you send a message in HTML, you might also want provide a plain text version in case some of the recipients use email readers that cannot display HTML content. 此类具有两个属性和，用于在电子邮件的内容中解析 Url。This class has two properties and that are used to resolve URLs within the content of the email. 是一系列对象。 is a collection of objects. 呈现时，电子邮件的内容中的 Url 首次匹配中的 Url每个对象中集合和已解决。When rendered, URLs within the email's content are first matched against the URLs in the of each object in the collection, and resolved. 若要解决在正文中的相对 Url 并也解决相对邮件读取器使用Url，请在集合。 is used by the mail reader to resolve relative URLs within the body, and also to resolve relative URLs, in the collection.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)

param.name: disposing
param.span: 若要释放托管资源和非托管资源，则为 ；若仅释放非托管资源，则为 。

span.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 释放由 占用的非托管资源，还可以另外再释放托管资源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用此方法由公共`Dispose()`方法和方法。This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the method. `Dispose()` 调用受保护`Dispose(Boolean)`方法替换`disposing`参数设置为`true`。`Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. 调用`Dispose`与`disposing`设置为`false`。 invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`. 当`disposing`参数为 true 时，此方法释放任何托管对象所持有的所有资源，此的引用。When the `disposing` parameter is true, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 此方法调用每个引用对象的 `Dispose()` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.

para.span: 可以由其他对象多次调用。

span.span: can be called multiple times by other objects.

para.span: 重写时小心不要引用已经释放的早期调用中的对象。

span.span: When overriding be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to .

para.span: 有关如何实现详细信息，请参阅[实现 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。

span.span: For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).

para.span: 有关详细信息并，请参阅[清理了非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)并[重写 Finalize 方法](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v=vs.100))。

span.span: For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v=vs.100)).

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property LinkedResources As LinkedResourceCollection

summary.span: 获取此附件引用的嵌入资源集。

value.span: 一个对象，它存储作为电子邮件消息的一部分发送的链接资源的集合。

span.span: A object that stores the collection of linked resources to be sent as part of an email message.
